full_threads.body:
Hey Will,

Hope you're having a great day! Just wanted to follow up on a few of your questions:
  • Email Settings:
    info@mathcap.com is now set to send to itself instead of the Iscre.com address—so that’s all sorted.
  • Reviews Placement:
    I’ve embedded the reviews within the contact page (screenshot attached). Let me know if that’s not the right spot—if you have a reference or another screenshot showing where they should go, I’m happy to update it! Still getting familiar with the layout.
  • Onboarding & Plan Info:
    Your pre-Wolf IQ plan is set to expire this September. Per your chat with Andy back in April, your current subscription is now for Wolf IQ. Victoria should’ve sent onboarding materials your way, but I’ve also attached the conversation notes here just in case.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need—always happy to help!

attachments.filename: Wolf IQ Mail - Wolf IQ Acquisition & What It Means for MathCap.pdf

(Time: 5mins) - gsheet row insertion for chateau apartments

Hi Will,

Just following up on my last note with a couple of quick clarifications:
  • The map location for Chateau Apartments at 201 NC-54, Carrboro, NC 27510 is now all set on our side—Daphne kindly pointed me to the right interface to get it updated.
  • For the DNS redirect (mathcap.com → www.mathcap.com), we can handle that for you after the onboarding wraps up. Victoria sent you an email to get things started—we’re just waiting on your reply there.
    • If you're in a hurry, feel free to invite our support account at support@wolfiq.com.au to your GoDaddy account, and we can jump in directly.

Let me know if anything else comes up—always happy to help!
(Time: 5mins) - changing July to June in Chateau location

Hi Will,

No worries at all, and thanks for the update! I've gone ahead and changed the Chateau location month from July to June—you're all set there.

For the map locations, we noticed it's using gpflow, which looks like a separate third-party tool. Do you happen to have login credentials for it? If so, feel free to send them over so we can help modify it for you.

On the GoDaddy redirect for mathcap.com → www.mathcap.com , we can handle this for you directly if you’d prefer to share your GoDaddy login. Or if you'd rather do it yourself, here’s how:
How to redirect your domain in GoDaddy:
  1. Log into your GoDaddy account.
  2. Go to Domains and select mathcap.com .
  3. Scroll to the Forwarding section and click Add under “Domain”.
  4. Set the Forward to field to https://www.mathcap.com .
  5. Choose Permanent (301) as the redirect type.
  6. Make sure “Forward only” is selected (no masking), then save.

Let me know what works best for you. Always happy to help if anything else comes up!

And this is my mistake, but the closing was June 30, not July.

Will Matheson | Co-Founder

(Time: 15mins) - verifying "invest with us" page signup form + DNS setting instructions + Content updates

Hey Will,

Happy Monday—hope your week’s off to a great start!

Just a quick one to let you know we’ve gone ahead and implemented the updates you requested. If there’s anything else you need or would like us to look into, feel free to give us a shout—always happy to help!

Hey Will,

Glad to hear the Chateau update’s looking good on your end!

Just a quick heads-up on the signup form for the "Invest With Us" page — I checked on both Chrome and Edge, and everything seems to be working smoothly here. It’s likely a cache issue on your side. You can try clearing it using these steps:
To clear cache in Microsoft Edge:
  • Open Edge
  • Click the three dots in the top right
  • Go to Settings > Privacy, search, and services
  • Scroll to Clear browsing data and click Choose what to clear
  • Make sure Cached images and files is selected
  • Set the time range to All time
  • Click Clear now

Alternatively, try using InPrivate mode (Edge’s incognito):
  • Open Edge
  • Click the three dots
  • Select New InPrivate window
  • Visit the site from there

That usually gives you a clean view of what users see.

For the DNS redirect via Cloudflare:
  1. Log in to Cloudflare and select your site (mathcap.com )
  2. Go to Rules > Page Rules, then click Create Page Rule
  3. Enter: http://mathcap.com/*
  4. Set the rule to Forwarding URL → 301 Permanent Redirect
  5. Redirect to: https://www.mathcap.com/$1
  6. Save and deploy

Also, make sure you have:
  • An A record for @ pointing to your server's IP, or
  • A CNAME record for @ pointing to www

This ensures both DNS and redirects are all sorted.

We’ll tackle the remaining updates early next week. Let me know if anything else pops up in the meantime!

Hope you have a great weekend!

The Chateau update looks good. I no longer see the sign up form on the "Invest with Us" page if I'm in Microsoft Edge. Can that be fixed? And can you tell me what I need to do to the DNS settings to fix it? Finally, can you make the following changes as well: Home Page
  • Multifamily Real Estate section
    • Change $100M+ to $140M+
    • Total Units changes to 1,000+
  • Next to recent acquisitions, change "Carolinas" to "Southeast"
Portfolio
  • Change "500 units across the Carolinas" to "800 units across the Southeast"

Here’s what we’ve taken care of so far:

  • InvestClearly reviews have been added to the sign-up page. Just to double-check—I assumed the sign-up page is also your contact page. Let me know if that needs adjusting.

On the DNS side, we don’t currently have access to your records, so we’re not able to make the update directly.

Always happy to help!
